snippet: The Watergate break-in happened 40 years ago Sunday, so we present a fantasy team of baseball players whose names evoke that 1970s political scandal.
abstract: Keeping Score column marks the 40th anniversary of the Watergate break-in with a fantasy team of baseball players whose names evoke that 1970s political scandal.
lead_paragraph: The Watergate break-in happened 40 years ago Sunday, so we present a fantasy team of baseball players whose names evoke that 1970s political scandal.

headline.seo: Plumbers in the Outfield: Meet the All-Watergate Team
